item.title: Need Good Coder For This
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

mid lvl

case 2475: // bh port mid 
if (pcombat => 50) {
teleportToX = 3000;
teleportToY = 4000;
sendMessage("welcome to medium lvl bounty hunter, watch out.");
}
else if (pcombat < 50) {
sendMessage("Your combat level is too low to enter.");
}
break;

high lvl

case 2476: // bh port high
if (pcombat < 75){
sendMessage("your PKing lvl is too low, try the medium lvl portal");
}
else if (pcombat => 75) {
teleportToX = 3555;
teleportToY = 4444;
sendMessage("welcome to medium lvl bounty hunter, watch out.");
}
break;

low lvl

case 7288: //bh low 
if (pcombat => 25) {
teleportToX = 3333;
teleportToY = 3999;
sendMessage("welcome to low lvl bounty hunter, watch out.");
}
else if (pcombat < 25) {
sendMessage("Your combat level is too low to enter.");
}
break;

pcombat can be changed to whatever you have combatlvl defined as.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Good Coder For This
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

im trying to add bh to my server, all i am working on now is telports, this is what i ahve so far for the 3 portals

alsofor my portals im useing slayerskill(pking skill on my server) if any knows hte code for combat lvl please tell me

mid lvl

case 2475: // bh port mid 
if (playerLevel[18] >= 75){
sendMessage("your PKing lvl is too high, try the high lvl portal");
}
else
{
if (playerLevel[18] <= 50){
sendMessage("your PKing lvl is too low, try the low lvl portal");
}
else
{
teleportToX = 3000;
teleportToY = 4000;
sendMessage("welcome to medium lvl bounty hunter, watch out.");
}
break;

high lvl

case 2476: // bh port high
if (playerLevel[18] <= 50){
sendMessage("your PKing lvl is too low, try the low lvl portal");
}
else
{
if (playerLevel[18] <= 75){
sendMessage("your PKing lvl is too low, try the medium lvl portal");
}
else
{
teleportToX = 3555;
teleportToY = 4444;
sendMessage("welcome to medium lvl bounty hunter, watch out.");
}
break;

low lvl

case 7288: // bh port Low
if (playerLevel[18] >= 75){
sendMessage("your PKing lvl is too high, try the high lvl portal");
}
else
{
if (playerLevel[18] >= 50){
sendMessage("your PKing lvl is too high, try the medium lvl portal");
}
else
{
teleportToX = 3333;
teleportToY = 3999;
sendMessage("welcome to low lvl bounty hunter, watch out.");
}
break;

im pretty sure those are right, but when i compile it says the cases are orphaned, if anyone would kind enough to help me i would gladly give them the full bounty hunter code(s).
(including a targeting system,about 50% done so far)

thank you for veiwing
~red_rooster

Read full topic
